name: YamlToDhall
help: Convert a YAML expression to a Dhall expression, given the expected Dhall type

properties.name: RecordsStrict
properties.help: Fail if any YAML fields are missing from the expected Dhall type

properties.name: RecordsLoose
properties.help: Tolerate JSON fields not present within the expected Dhall type

properties.name: NoKeyValArrays
properties.help: Disable conversion of key-value arrays to records

properties.name: NoKeyValMaps
properties.help: Disable conversion of homogeneous map objects to association lists

properties.name: UnionsFirst
properties.help: The first value with the matching type (successfully parsed all the way down the tree) is accepted, even if not the only possible match

properties.name: UnionsStrict
properties.help: Error if more than one union values match the type (and parse successfully)

properties.name: OmissibleLists
properties.help: Tolerate missing list values, they are assumed empty

properties.name: File
properties.help: Read YAML expression from a file instead of standard input

properties.name: Output
properties.help: Write Dhall expression to a file instead of standard output

properties.name: ASCII
properties.help: Format code using only ASCII syntax
